page.title: 17JOB SURVEY
page.content: WE WENT AROUND THE SCHOOL TO ASK ABOUT{JOBS}.WE FOUND A GREAT MANY PARENTS WORK LOCALLY,THERE WRE 36 IN THE SCHOOL. THE LARGEST EMPLOYERS WERE THE{OIL FIRMS OF SHELL AND MOBIL.THEY EMPLOY 45 PEOPLE. MANY MOTHERS WERE {HOUSEWIVES}.THE JOBS WERE VERY VARIED FROM{FIREMEN}TO{TAXI DRIVERS.}THE MOST UNUSUAL{JOB}WAS ONE OF{DESIGNING {MISSILES}.WE WERE LUCKY THAT MANY PEOPLE HAD JOBS,ONLY 35 WERE UN EMPLOYED. MY DAD (TRACY MERRIT) WORKS IN GRAYS, IN THE{DEPARTMENT OF {TRANSPORT}.HE WORKS AS A WORKSHOP SUPERINTENDANT. WHEN HE IS NOT WORKING IN GRAYS HE WORKS AS A{DRIVING {INSTRUCTOR}.MY MUM WORKS IN OUR SCHOOL AS A{DINNER LADY}.IN THE LATE AFTERNOON,ABOUT TEN PAST FIVE, SHE GOES TO SHELL REFINERY AS A{CLEANER.
